<jobs>
    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Tax Consultant]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Who We Are:
  

  
1-800Accountant is defining a new accounting services model to help business owners navigate the new economy. We combine technology with a dedicated accountant to serve the needs of start-ups, entrepreneurs and small businesses by providing extraordinary service at an affordable price. Our team helps business owners focus on the passion they have for their business while helping them with their finances creating a collaborative effort to help their business thrive.
  

  
 
  

  
The Role:
  

  
Our growing team is looking for Tax Consultants to a ssist our clients with all of their tax needs and tax related questions.  In this opportunity, you will advise clients on all thing tax related!!  Our staff is rich with both seasoned accountants and new members and we provide great growth opportunities. 
  

  
 
  

  
This is a contract/ 1099 opportunity. It is YEAR ROUND (NOT seasonal) 
  

  
 
  

  
Responsibilities:
  

  

  
+ Manage and advise a high volume of small/start-up business owners within various industries to be compliant with federal and state regulations
  

  
+ Build relationships with clients to assist with their tax needs on an ongoing basis
  

  
+ Follow designed workflows and procedures to ensure clients meet set deadlines
  

  
+ Working knowledge of general business practices and ability to demonstrate business and financial acumen
  

  
+ Be the point of contact for providing guidance and support of 1-800Accountants accounting portal system
  

  
+ Timely and professional communication with clients via softphone/messaging system
  

  
+ Guide clients through the bookkeeping software and review financials for accuracy
  

  
+ Follow up with members of the team to ensure that the completion of tasks align with your tax strategy 
  

  

  
 
  

  
Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Relevant degree or combination of education and tax experience 
  

  
+ 1+ years experience with personal and small business taxation
  

  
+ Proficiency in related technologies; spreadsheets, tax prep and bookkeeping software 
  

  
+ Adaptable with process and system changes 
  

  
+ Up to date on the latest tax codes
  

  
+ Conflict resolution skills
  

  
+ Capable of building strong client relationships over the phone while remaining committed              to 1-800Accountant’s vision and objectives 
  

  
+ Enrolled Agent License and/or CPA Certification (preferred) 
  

  

  
 
  

  
Benefits:
  

  

  
+ Work with a leading virtual accounting firm
  

  
+ 100% remote
  

  
+ Flexible schedule
  

  
+ Work with a sophisticated proprietary software
  

  
+ Join an engaging community of like-minded individuals
  

  
+ Exposure to a large variety of industries
  

  

  
 
  

  
Powered by JazzHR

    <job>
        <title><![CDATA[Work From Home Tax Preparer]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Who We Are:
  

  
1-800Accountant is defining a new accounting services model to help business owners navigate the new economy. We combine technology with a dedicated accountant to serve the needs of start-ups, entrepreneurs and small businesses by providing extraordinary service at an affordable price. Our team helps business owners focus on the passion they have for their business while helping them with their finances creating a collaborative effort to help their business thrive.
  

  
 
  

  
The Role:
  

  
We are looking to partner with experienced and personable remote tax preparers for the upcoming tax season! In this opportunity, you will prepare individual and small business tax returns for clients throughout the 2022 tax season. Clients will be provided by 1-800Accountant.
  

  
 
  

  
Responsibilities:
  

  

  
+ Prepare individual (1040) and business tax returns (1120,1120s,1065) and associated schedules and financial statements
  

  
+ Collect and research data, synthesize complex and diverse information
  

  
+ Work with our clients (primarily small business owners in every state and in nearly every industry)
  

  
+ Communicate with our clients on an ongoing basis to collect necessary information to fulfill compliance and filings
  

  

  
 
  

  
Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Active Preparer tax identification number (PTIN) 
  

  
+ Proficiency in Tax Software 
  

  
+ 2+ years of tax preparing experience (personal and business), within the last 3 years
  

  
+ Knowledge of SALT filings and various industry tax treatment
  

  
+ Outstanding communication and collaboration skills with both clients and team members
  

  
+ Ability to work and meet strict deadlines with minimal supervision
  

  
+ Dedicated home office space
  

  

  
 
  

  
Preferred Qualifications:
  

  

  
+ Enrolled Agent License 
  

  

  
 
  

  
Benefits: 
  

  

  
+ Work with the country’s largest virtual accounting firm
  

  
+ Flexible schedule
  

  
+ Work with cutting edge technology
  

  
+ Join an engaging community of like minded individuals
  

  

  
 
  

  
 
  

  
Powered by JazzHR
